actions_table_warning_content: Depending on the API node you are connected to, the history of your account may vary. If results are missing, either change the API node you connect to or verify your account history on an external block explorer using the link below.
actions_table_row_newaccount_text_one: Created an account with the account name
actions_table_row_regproxy_text_one: You registered as a proxy voter.
actions_table_row_regproxy_text_two: You unregistered as a proxy voter.
actions_table_row_update_auth_text: Permissions updated (view transaction on block explorer for details).
actions_table_row_voteproducer_text_one: You have stopped proxying your producer votes.
actions_table_row_voteproducer_text_two: proxied his/her producer votes to you.
actions_table_row_voteproducer_text_thre: You proxied your producer votes to
actions_table_row_voteproducer_text_four: You updated your producer votes to
